thread.title: BRIEF-Union Pacific ‍Anticipates It Will Make Required Deadlines For Installing PTC On Its Network

title: BRIEF-Union Pacific ‍Anticipates It Will Make Required Deadlines For Installing PTC On Its Network
text:
February 7, 2018 / 8:02 PM / in 15 minutes BRIEF-Union Pacific ‍Anticipates It Will Make Required Deadlines For Installing PTC On Its Network Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Union Pacific Corp: 
* UNION PACIFIC CORP - ‍ANTICIPATES IT WILL MAKE ALL REQUIRED DEADLINES FOR INSTALLING POSITIVE TRAIN CONTROL ON ITS NETWORK ​ 
* UNION PACIFIC CORP - PLANS TO SPEND ABOUT $180 MILLION ON POSITIVE TRAIN CONTROL IN 2018 TOWARD CURRENT TOTAL ESTIMATED $2.9 BILLION COST​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
